</Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>I voluntarily agree to the provisions of this Consent regarding my admission and treatment as a patient at Pinnacle Hospital (the "Hospital"). As part of the course of my care and/or diagnosis and treatment of my medical or surgical condition, I consent to the administration of medications, tests, procedures, services, items and hands-on care and to physical examinations (collectively "Care") by physicians practicing at the Hospital ("Physicians") and other Hospital personnel ("Care Providers"). I agree to follow all rules and regulations of the Hospital related to patient and visitor conduct and safety.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> understand that I may revoke this Consent at any time by providing written notice to the Hospital. My revocation will be effective upon receipt by the Hospital unless I specify a later date. However, I acknowledge that my revocation will not have any effect on any action taken by the Hospital in reliance on the Consent before the Hospital received my revocation. I understand that if I refuse to give the Consent or revoke this Consent, the Hospital may refuse to provide treatment to me where permitted by law and will hold me responsible for payment of my charges for the Care received at Hospital and by my Physicians or Care Providers.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>Segoe UI</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>Segoe UI</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>I also understand that if I do not revoke this Consent it will not expire until payment in full is received for my Care by the Hospital, Physicians and Care Providers or one year after the date this Consent is signed. I understand that I have a right to inspect and copy my medical record.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>Segoe UI</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>Segoe UI</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>I acknowledge that the Hospital cannot guarantee that once the Hospital discloses my health information pursuant to this consent to a recipient, the recipient will not re-disclose the information to a third party. I further understand that the recipient or any third party may not be required to comply with this Consent or applicable federal and state laws regarding use and disclosure of my health information.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>Segoe UI</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> </Paragraphs> <rd:DefaultName>Textbox1</rd:DefaultName> <Top>0.04167in</Top> <Left>0.125in</Left> <Height>8.87444in</Height> <Width>8.00917in</Width> <Style> <Border> <Style>None</Style> </Border> <PaddingLeft>2pt</PaddingLeft> <PaddingRight>2pt</PaddingRight> <PaddingTop>2pt</PaddingTop> <PaddingBottom>2pt</PaddingBottom> </Style> </Textbox> <Textbox Name="Textbox40"> <CanGrow>true</CanGrow> <KeepTogether>true</KeepTogether> <Paragraphs> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>=Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.Reports.DataMethodUtility. <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> <TextRun> <Value>Pinnacle Responsibility</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Bold</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>Underline</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style /> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style /> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>In consideration of the Care I will receive for my admission and treatment and/or any subsequent related admissions or treatments, including but not limited to, inpatient, outpatient, or clinical visits, I hereby obligate myself individually to the Hospital, my Physicians and Care Providers and agree to pay for any and all charges and expenses incurred or to be incurred. I agree and understand that regardless of any and all assigned benefits, monies and/or cause(s) of action, I am responsible for the total charges for services rendered. I agree that all amounts are due upon request and are payable to the Hospital, my Physicians and Care Providers. I agree to pay for any and all charges and expenses incurred or to be incurred. I acknowledge that my Physicians and Care Providers may submit separate billing statements for payment of the Care they provide. All accounts with respect to Care rendered to me ("Account(s)") are due and payable in Indiana. I understand that the extent of my personal liability may be limited under a contractual arrangement between my insurer and the Hospital. I agree that if the Account results in a credit balance, the credit amount will be applied to any of my outstanding Accounts, either current or bad debt. In the event I do not have any other outstanding Account balances and my credit balance is $10.00 or less, such credit balance will be non-refundable to me.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>I authorize the Hospital to obtain a credit report with respect to my credit history from one or more credit reporting agencies. I further acknowledge that the Hospital may elect to sell my Account to a third party for collection. I understand that if my Account is referred to a collection agency or law firm for nonpayment, I will be responsible: (a) for late payment fees on the unpaid balance of my Account in an amount equal to the lesser of the maximum rate permitted by law or eighteen percent (18%), and (b) to pay all collection costs, expenses and reasonable attorney’s fees. I certify that I am not delinquent in the payment of any amount owed to the Hospital on my behalf or on behalf of any person for whom I am legally responsible ("Delinquent Account") and, if I am responsible for any Delinquent Account, I have made arrangements for payment at this time. If there are any credit balances at the Hospital related to any prior Accounts, I authorize the Hospital to transfer such credit balances to the Account. I authorize Hospital to provide information about me (whether received from me or a credit reporting agency) to third parties for payment-related purposes, including but not limited to billing, collection, planning payment arrangements, and seeking eligibility for uncompensated care and/or government programs. I further certify that the information I have provided in connection with the foregoing is true, complete and accurate in every respect.</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>4. </Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Normal</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>None</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> <TextRun> <Value>Assignment of Benefits</Value> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Bold</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>Underline</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value /> <MarkupType>HTML</MarkupType> <Style> <FontStyle>Normal</FontStyle> <FontFamily>segoe ui</FontFamily> <FontWeight>Bold</FontWeight> <TextDecoration>Underline</TextDecoration> <Color>#000000</Color> </Style> </TextRun> </TextRuns> <Style> <TextAlign>Left</TextAlign> </Style> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <TextRuns> <TextRun> <Value>The Hospital may agree to accept an assignment of my insurance plan benefits. If the Hospital agrees to such assignment, I acknowledge that my Care has been and/or will be rendered by the Hospital and my Physicians and/or Care Providers, and that I may be entitled to receive payment for my Care under one or more health insurance plan(s.) ("Insurance Plan(s)") or any claim I might assert against others because of my injuries (my "Claim"). In consideration of my Care rendered or to be rendered for this admission and treatment and/or any subsequent related admission and treatment, including, but not limited to, inpatient, outpatient, or clinical visits, I hereby irrevocably assign and transfer to the Hospital all right, title and interest: In all benefits or monies payable for Care rendered, including but not limited to: group medical, indemnity, self-insured or ERISA benefits or coverage; PIP; UIM/UM; auto or homeowner insurance; and in all causes of action against any party or entity that may be responsible for payment of benefits or monies regardless of whether or not I ultimately settle my claim with a non-admission of liability provision. I fully understand that in the event the Hospital files a claim on my behalf that the same does not impose any contractual obligation or otherwise upon the Hospital and that I remain fully responsible for instituting suit within the applicable statute of limitations regardless of the assignment of causes of action. I authorize the Hospital to appeal any denial under my appeal rights provision. It is hereby agreed and understood that any condition precedent, subsequent or otherwise, including, but not limited to, pre-certification, pre-authorization, or second opinions shall remain my sole responsibility. I further understand that failure to pre-certify could result in denial or reduction of payments from my insurance company, leaving myself financially responsible for the non-reimbursed portion of my bill.
